stories.headline: Targeting voting wrongs
stories.summary: An investigation into voting rights violations in Teaneck, New Jersey, revealing racially polarized voting patterns and the potential for federal intervention.

stories.headline: Examining evacuation during nightclub fire
stories.summary: Using computer simulations to analyze evacuation patterns during the Rhode Island nightclub fire, which killed 100 people, to identify potential improvements in safety regulations.

stories.headline: Property data analysis finds extra tax credits
stories.summary: Analysis of property tax records in Indianapolis uncovered thousands of improper homestead tax credits, resulting in significant revenue losses.

stories.headline: New training director making mark
stories.author_title: NICAR and Missouri School of Journalism
stories.summary: Introducing David Donald as the new training director at IRE and NICAR, detailing his experience and contributions to the field.

stories.headline: New-teacher data boosts narrative project
stories.summary: Data analysis reveals a significant number of older individuals entering teaching in Oregon, challenging common assumptions about new teacher demographics.
